title: SUNNY BRIGHT 4BR/2BATH HOUSE NEAR NEW FFLD METRO RR
posting_body: ['SUNNY, BRIGHT FAIRFIELD, CT 1680 SF', 'CONTEMPORARY HOUSE NEAR NEW', 'FFLD METRO RR - 4 BR/2 BATH.', 'SEE ONLINE VIDEO TOUR LINK (Copy and Paste):', '<URL>', 'Sunny, Bright, Modern Open Contemporary', '1st Floor with Cathedral Ceiling, Skylight', "and 2 Ceiling Light/Fans, approx'ly 1680SF.", 'Full Basement with Washer and Dryer.', 'Very Large Open Floor Plan on 1st Floor', 'with open LR, Kitchen and Dinette Areas', 'Plus 2BR’s and Full Bath on 1st Floor.', '2nd Floor has 2 more BR’s and 2nd Full Bath.', 'Hardwood Floors everywhere, except', 'Tile in both Bathrooms.', 'Central A/C and Gas Hot Air Heat', 'and Gas Domestic Hot Water.', 'Includes Gas Downdraft Cooktop in', 'Center Island, Wall Oven, Refrigerator,', 'D/W and Security System.', 'Off Street Parking for 4+ Cars and', 'Back Deck.', '½ Mile to I-95 Exit 24; 2 Miles to Rt 15', 'Merritt Parkway Exit 45; .8 mi’s to new', 'Fairfield Metro RR Station.', '2.1 Mile to Fairfield University;', '3.2 Mile to Sacred Heart University;', 'Cats allowed at extra $50/mo Each;', 'Some smaller, non-dangerous Dogs', 'Allowed at extra $75/mo Each.', 'Tenant Pays All Utilities, 1st Month', 'Rent Plus 2 Month Security Deposit.', 'Available Immediately!', 'CALL 203-726-7600 and LEAVE ALL', 'YOUR REQUIRED INFORMATION!', 'We look forward to hearing from you', 'and have a Great Day!']
